short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Prefetch Submitty links for faster navigation.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This tool automatically prefetches links to the next and previous student pages, ensuring faster load times and smoother transitions during grading or browsing sessions. It updates link behaviors to direct clicks straight to the intended pages, optimizing your workflow on https://submitty.cs.rpi.edu/. Ideal for educators and students seeking a more efficient online grading experience.
